title: Historic Normandy Countryside Elegance with Michelin-Starred Restaurant, Day Spa & Pools
description: Journey into the heart of French luxury and discover timeless elegance at Hotel De La Licorne. Nestled in the heart of France's picturesque Lyons-la-Foret, this boutique destination dates back to 1610, still upholding an air of regal sophistication with its antique furnishings and stunning views of surrounding vineyards. Spend days exploring the region's historic chateaux, sipping on wines and, as the sun sets, retreating to the hotel's Michelin-starred restaurant La Licorne Royale.

title: Charming Normandy Boutique Escape with Indoor Pool & Day Spa
description: Sojourn in the charming countryside and become enamoured with the elegance of Hotel Le Grand Cerf. A jewel nestled in the heart of Lyons-la-Foret, this luxury haven is set within an original 17th-century Normandy building that’s equal parts quaint and opulent, near the region's famed châteaux and vineyards. Indulge in authentic gastronomic delights at the hotel's onsite bistro, Le Bistro du Grand Cerf, or rejuvenate your mind and body with an afternoon at the tranquil Spa LUXE.
